name: Dead Rush (Alpha 1.01)
description:
Welcome to Dead Rush (Alpha 1.01) How Long can You survive the Zombie Apocalypse?

Enjoyed with an Xbox One or PS4 Controller
(plug in before starting)

CONTROLS PS4/XBOX

Aim - L2 / Left Trigger

Shoot - R2 / Right Trigger

Reload -  Square / X

Melee - Right Stick Button

Cycle Inventory - Triangle / Y

Drop Item - Triangle / Y (Hold)

Use Passive - Up D-Pad (White Square ; Charges over Time )

Use Ultimate - Down D-Pad (Yellow Bar ; Charges with kills)

NAVIGATION

Jump - X / A

Look - Right Stick

Move - Left Stick

Sprint - Left Stick Button

Thanks For Playing!

Feedback and suggestions are much appreciated
